creator.description: Labeller to highlight Nepo Baby accounts - mostly in media and politics - where the person in question has famous or influential family, especially if their parents/relative have a blue link on Wikipedia. See also @daddys.cash for private school labels

locales.description: Child of prominent left winger, marxist academic, trade unionist or similar - but who has turned out to be a neoliberal or right winger or the like
locales.name: Disappointment

locales.description: One or both of this person's parents have Wikipedia blue links
locales.name: Blue Link (parent)

locales.description: Another member of this person's family has a Wikipedia blue link
locales.name: Blue Link (other family)

locales.description: This person has a famous or notable family member, but either they or the family member does not have a Wikipedia link.
locales.name: Famous Relative (no Wikipedia)
